content: I have observed this in my community where a Jewish cemetery was vandalized in Philadelphia and a Jewish Community Center in South Jersey received a bomb threat. There are no more slots available to volunteer for the cemetery cleanup due to the wide and diverse turnout. And 150 people of all religions and ethnicities came out to rally at the JCC with just 24 hours notice. It was truly uplifting. I posted about some of this. This Jewish Cemetery Vandalism Hits HomeAmerica, stop the blame game. Start working together.extranewsfeed.com
